sentence.Network_en: With vague circumstantial evidence pointing to Philippe, he was immediately arrested and charged with patricide.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于各种含糊其词的旁证都指向菲利浦, 他很快就被拘捕并因弑父罪遭到指控.

sentence.Network_en: When a will was discovered near the man's dead body, patricide was suspected.
sentence.Network_cn: 当男尸旁的遗嘱被发现时, 人们便怀疑这是一桩杀父案.
